title: BBC Local Live: Coventry & Warwickshire on Wednesday 9 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: flooding closes schools and roads around warwickshire and coventry .
sex offences against children almost treble in a year in warwickshire .
nuneaton and bedworth has the most teenage pregnancy in england and wales .

documents.title: our live coverage from across the day
text: that 's all from local live on wednesday .
join us again from 08:00 on thursday for more news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: watch : latest forecast for the west midlands
text: we 've still got a yellow warning in place from the met office for more heavy rain to come in the next hour .
highs of 6c ( 43f ) .
find out what else is in store for us .
author: Shefali Oza
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: warwickshire residents ' guide to local travel disruption
text: warwickshire residents can find out what roads have been affected by the flooding and which schools are closed by visiting the county council website .

documents.title: rugby train disruption to to continue into tomorrow 's peak
text: train operator london midland has warned there will be disruption for the rest of the day on services between rugby and euston although some services to northampton are now starting to get through .
the company also said some services in tomorrow 's peak `` may have fewer carriages than normal '' .

documents.title: action to pump water out of a flooded railway tunnel
text: here 's the # orangearmy pumping water from the flooded railway tunnel at crick , near rugby , this morning .
and that , s exactly where my train is paddling along now @ twitterid @ twitterid
@ twitterid wow that 's bad

documents.title: roads still shut due to floods
text: some roads in south warwickshire remain shut due to flooding .
the a425 in lower shuckburgh is closed around the jubilee avenue junction and the a3400 in tredington is closed between the a429 fosse way junction and the b4035 mill street junction .
there 's also slow traffic on the a46 northbound in longbridge between longbridge island and stanks , because of flooding .
marston lane in bedworth is closed near the lilac road junction .
click here for more details

documents.title: latest : severe flooding ; teenage pregnancy ; junior doctors strike
text: if you are just catching up on wednesday 's news , here are our headlines :
- severe flooding closes schools and roads around warwickshire and coventry
- nuneaton and bedworth had the highest rates of conception for under-18s in england and wales , new figures show
- junior doctors strike for 48 hours
author: Alex Homer
BBC Local Live

documents.title: timelapse footage captures rising water levels
text: if you want an idea of how much water levels have risen , this footage should help .

documents.title: roads closed in nuneaton after lorry and tractor collide
text: motorists are being warned of road closures following a serious crash in nuneaton .
author: Nuneaton News

documents.title: flood warnings in place around the region
text: there are currently 17 flood warnings in place - meaning flooding is expected - around the cv postcode according to the environment agency .
there are no severe flood warnings at the moment but there are 26 flood alerts - meaning flooding is possible .

documents.title: kenilworth man pulls car from flood water
text: `` it 's just stupid really . ''
a resident who helped pull a trapped car free gives his assessment of drivers not heeding warning signs and trying to plough through flood water .

documents.title: jess glynne announces ricoh arena concert
text: jess glynne has announced she will appear at the ricoh arena next month .

the singer behind chart toppers such as rather be , not letting go , and my love will perform a warm-up gig in the jaguar hall on 29 april , ahead of her upcoming uk tour , with 3,500 tickets being made available .
tickets go on sale 09:00 on friday .

documents.title: sky blues fall to fourth consecutive defeat
text: coventry fell to their fourth loss in a row and slipped three points off the play-off places as they went down to defeat against relegation-threatened shrewsbury .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: teen pregnancy rate highest in nuneaton and bedworth as conceptions continue to fall
text: the number of teenage girls getting pregnant in england and wales is continuing to fall , figures show .
there were about 23 conceptions per 1,000 15 to 17-year-old girls in 2014 , compared to a high of 55 in 1971 , the office of national statistics said .
that means a target , set in 1998 by the then labour government , to halve teen pregnancies by 2010 has finally been met , six years late .
nuneaton and bedworth was the area with the highest conception rate among under-18s .
alison hadley , who led the government 's strategy , warned the job was not over .

documents.title: sex offences almost treble in warwickshire
text: cases of sex offences against children in warwickshire have almost trebled over the last year , according to new figures from the police .
more than 360 were reported , which is up from 129 .
that compares with a fall of around 8 % across the west midlands force area to 1,300 .

documents.title: snitterfield flood water 'came into homes as drivers ploughed through '
text: thanks to sue james for emailing us these from snitterfield this morning .
she said some water was washed inside nearby houses as drivers pushed through floods .
she suggested in future similar situations , some roads should be closed by officials .

documents.title: rugby rail disruption will last 'to the end of service '
text: a signalling problem caused by flooding between rugby and milton keynes central / northampton is causing major disruption to journeys between these stations , the national rail website says .
this is expected to continue until the end of service .

text: perhaps different work attire is needed for these conditions .

but virgin trains did a fine job of keeping everyone informed , he said , and his train was only 20 minutes late .

documents.title: railway flooded between wood end and stratford
text: heavy rain has flooded the railway between wood end and stratford-upon-avon meaning trains between birmingham moor street and stratford-upon-avon via wood end are being disrupted , the national rail website says .
this is expected to continue until 16:00 .

documents.title: trains stopped between rugby and milton keynes and travellers advised to avoid
text: earlier we reported delays on trains between rugby and milton keynes central because of flooding but the services have now been stopped due to the extent of the problem .

rail replacement buses were ordered earlier but london midland now says it is `` advising passengers not to travel between rugby and milton keynes either by rail or other transport due to the severe flooding '' .

documents.title: more floods on the roads
text: one lane is closed and there 's slow traffic on the a46 in both directions between marraway roundabout in norton lindsey and the a425 birmingham road junction in budbrooke , because of flooding , bbc travel says .

flooding has also shut the a425 in lower shuckburgh around the jubilee avenue junction , and the a428 coventry road in church lawford is closed in both directions between the school street junction and the green junction .
click here for more road closures .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: motorists stuggle through floods
text: heavy rain has closed many major roads in warwickshire
police said the a46 is shut at longbridge island and the m40 with traffic standing still through warwick and stratford .
the a428 through church lawford is shut and there 's delays on the a445 princethorpe due to a vehicle stuck in flood water .
the a425 lower shuckborough is also shut due to flooding and the a428 coventry road is closed between school street and the green .
the advice is to listen to local news bulletins before you set off .

documents.title: driving through flood water at kenilworth ford
text: this was the scene earlier as drivers pushed through water that had overflowed onto the road at kenilworth road .
author: Richard Williams
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: flooding shuts wolston road
text: just received an update that the main road from bretford to wolston is closed due to flooding .
no signs up at the moment .
please be careful !

documents.title: drivers rescued from cars trapped in flood water in warwickshire
text: drivers have needed to be rescued from cars trapped in flood water in warwickshire including at great alne , wolston , baginton and princethorpe , says warwickshire fire & rescue service .
a `` high number of calls '' were being made about flooding , said the service , with reports also coming from stoneleigh , gaydon , wellesbourne and hampton on the hill .

documents.title: still some rain to come but environment agency says 'we have seen the worst of it '
text: there 's a lot of surface water and flooding on the roads across coventry and warwickshire this morning .
mark swain from the environment agency said `` we had seen the worst of it '' already but there was still between 5-10mm of rain to come .
homes and businesses in eastern green were flooded by water from the nearby guphill brook last month .
tim brooks from one of the affected businesses , broad lane leisure , said he hoped it would not happen again .

documents.title: flooding closes 13 warwickshire schools
text: a total of 13 schools around warwickshire are closed due to flooding today .
here is the list from the county council .

documents.title: junior doctors ' strike in area : 48-hour walkout begins
text: operations at hospitals across the midlands are expected to be cancelled as the third junior doctors ' strike is taking place over 48 hours .
the action last month resulted in the cancellation of 50 operations and at least 150 other procedures , while 1,400 appointments were postponed .
the doctors are protesting against proposals for a new contract that makes changes to working hours and pay .
two more strikes are planned next month .
author: BBC Midlands Today

keep up with the latest information .
drivers had to be rescued on the fosseway near wolston this morning after driving through flood water .

documents.title: good morning from local live for coventry and warwickshire
text: i 'm bringing you wednesday 's latest news , sport , travel and weather .
if you see stories you think we should be covering , or have of the area you want to showcase , email us , tweet us or reach us on facebook .
author: Alex Homer
BBC Local Live
